hero.description: Discover a hassle-free way to book your next car in North Macedonia. With Jolzt, you can skip the counters and easily rent a car directly from the app, all from the comfort of your home.
hero.experience: Experience convenience, flexibility, and premium service every time you drive.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Renting a car with Jolzt is quick, easy, and worry-free. We've simplified the process to save you time and money.
howItWorks.bookInMinutesDesc: Choose dates, browse cars, and book instantly. No paperwork, no waiting in line.
howItWorks.saveUp: Save up to 30% compared to traditional rentals
howItWorks.skipCounterDesc: Go straight to your car with our digital check-in. No lines, no paperwork, just grab and drive.
howItWorks.driveWorryFreeDesc: Full insurance included with 24/7 roadside assistance. Free cancellation up to 48 hours.
howItWorks.learnMore: Learn more about how Jolzt works

findRide.title: Find your perfect ride

about.subtitle: We're making car rental super fun and ridiculously easy in North Macedonia! üöó‚ú®
about.storyPart1: It all started when we asked ourselves:
about.storyQuestion: "Why is renting a car such a pain?"
about.storyPart2: We were tired of endless paperwork, confusing prices, and rental counters that looked like time machines from the 1990s. So we decided to fix it! üõ†Ô∏è
about.storyPart3: Our platform connects you directly with great rental companies in North Macedonia. No more waiting in lines, no more paperwork headaches, and absolutely NO hidden fees! Just tap, book, and drive. Simple as that! ‚úåÔ∏è
about.storyPart4: Born with ‚ù§Ô∏è in North Macedonia, our mission is to bring this hassle-free experience to travelers across the Balkans. Because life's too short for complicated car rentals!
about.secretSauce: Here's the secret sauce that makes Jolzt so special (don't tell everyone!) ü§´
about.noNastySurprisesDesc: We hate hidden fees as much as you do! What you see is what you pay - no exceptions, no excuses, no tiny asterisks!
about.ridiculouslySimpleDesc: We're obsessed with making car rental so easy that your grandma could do it! If it takes you more than 3 minutes to book, we've failed!
about.customerLoveDesc: We're not happy unless you're happy! Our support team doesn't just solve problems - they make your day better!
about.dreamTeamDesc: The amazing people behind Jolzt who are making car rental fun again!
about.readyToExperienceDesc: Join thousands of happy travelers who've discovered the fun way to rent cars in North Macedonia. Book your first ride today and see what all the buzz is about!

howItWorks.title: How Jolzt Works
howItWorks.description: Renting a car has never been easier. Learn how Jolzt is revolutionizing car rental in North Macedonia.
howItWorks.searchCompareDesc: Enter your pickup location, dates, and time to see all available cars from multiple rental companies in one place.
howItWorks.comparePrice: Compare prices from multiple rental companies
howItWorks.seeRealTime: See real-time availability and transparent pricing
howItWorks.filterByCar: Filter by car type, features, and more
howItWorks.bookInMinutesDesc: Choose your car and complete your reservation with just a few taps. No long forms or complicated processes.
howItWorks.skipCounterDesc: No more waiting in long lines at rental counters. With Jolzt, you can go straight to your car with our digital check-in process.
howItWorks.digitalCheckIn: Digital check-in via the Jolzt app
howItWorks.noWaiting: No waiting in lines or filling out paperwork
howItWorks.getToYourCar: Get to your car in minutes
howItWorks.driveReturnDesc: Enjoy your trip with peace of mind knowing 24/7 roadside assistance is included. When it's time to return, simply park the car and complete the digital check-out.
howItWorks.downloadApp: Download the app and start renting
howItWorks.joinPlatformDesc: Register your rental company on Jolzt by providing your business information and completing the verification process.
howItWorks.noUpfront: No upfront costs or monthly fees
howItWorks.listYourFleetDesc: Add your vehicles to the Jolzt platform with detailed information, photos, and pricing. Our intuitive dashboard makes fleet management easy.
howItWorks.setYourOwn: Set your own prices and availability
howItWorks.bulkUpload: Bulk upload options for larger fleets
howItWorks.manageBookingsDesc: Receive real-time booking notifications and manage all your reservations through the Jolzt partner dashboard.
howItWorks.growYourBusinessDesc: Increase your revenue and expand your customer base with Jolzt's marketing and promotional tools.
howItWorks.accessToWider: Access to a wider customer base
howItWorks.faqDesc: Find answers to common questions about using Jolzt for your car rental needs.
howItWorks.isInsuranceIncludedAnswer: Yes, all rentals include basic insurance coverage. Additional coverage options are available during the booking process if you want extra protection.
howItWorks.canIModify: Can I modify or cancel my reservation?
howItWorks.canIModifyAnswer: Yes, you can modify or cancel your reservation through the app or website. Free cancellation is available up to 48 hours before your scheduled pickup time.
howItWorks.whatPaymentMethodsAnswer: We accept all major credit cards in the renter's name. Prepaid or debit cards are not accepted. Some premium car categories may require 2 credit cards.
howItWorks.isThereMileageAnswer: Most of our rentals come with unlimited mileage. If there is a mileage restriction for your specific rental, it will be clearly stated during the booking process.

travelGuides.title: Travel Guides & Destinations
travelGuides.subtitle: Discover the best places to visit in North Macedonia and plan your perfect trip
travelGuides.lakeOhridDesc: Discover crystal clear waters, historic churches, and charming villages around one of Europe's oldest and deepest lakes. Lake Ohrid is a UNESCO World Heritage site offering incredible natural beauty and rich cultural heritage.
travelGuides.skopjeDesc: Wander through one of the oldest and largest marketplaces in the Balkans, with its authentic Ottoman architecture and vibrant atmosphere. Discover hidden gems, traditional crafts, and delicious local cuisine.
travelGuides.mavrovoTitle: Road Trip Through Mavrovo National Park
travelGuides.mavrovoDesc: Experience stunning mountain landscapes, pristine lakes, and outdoor activities in North Macedonia's largest national park. Perfect for hiking, skiing, and wildlife watching year-round.
travelGuides.roadTripDesc: North Macedonia is perfect for road trips, with diverse landscapes, historical sites, and charming towns all within short drives of each other. Rent a car with Jolzt and explore at your own pace.
travelGuides.browseTravel: Browse our travel guides to find inspiration
travelGuides.selectVehicle: Select a vehicle that suits your journey
travelGuides.enjoyFreedom: Enjoy the freedom to explore at your own pace
travelGuides.cityGuidesDesc: We're working on detailed guides for all major cities in North Macedonia.
travelGuides.natureGuidesDesc: We're working on comprehensive guides to North Macedonia's natural attractions.
travelGuides.culturalGuidesDesc: We're working on detailed guides to North Macedonia's rich cultural heritage.
travelGuides.subscribeDesc: Get the latest travel guides, tips, and special offers delivered straight to your inbox
